foreignData.text:
Eile

name: Goblin Fire Fiend
originalText:
Haste
Defending player blocks Goblin Fire Fiend if able.
{R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: If Goblin Fire Fiend is attacking, the defending player must assign at least one blocker to it during the declare blockers step if that player controls any creatures that could block Goblin Fire Fiend.

text:
Haste
Goblin Fire Fiend must be blocked if able.
{R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
